channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Social Security Administration quietly corrects blog on taxation of benefits — but confusion persists
item.description: Public comments on the agency’s blog show beneficiaries remain confused about the new law.

item.title: PayPal’s ‘battleground’ stock heads for longest winning streak in years. Earnings are on deck.
item.description: PayPal’s stock is on track to rise for the eighth session in a row, but analysts have a hard time making a call about the future.

item.title: AutoNation’s stock rises as higher car prices help it beat sales and profit estimates
item.description: Customers shrugged off higher prices and drove up sales, while AutoNation said it’s well positioned to handle higher tariffs.

item.title: Intel Stock Plunges as Foundry Struggles and Job Cuts Shake Investor Confidence
item.description: Buckle up, folks, because Intel (INTC) is making waves in the market today—and not the good kind! As of this writing, Intel stock is taking a beating,...

item.title: Charter is bleeding internet subscribers — and the stock could see its worst day ever
item.description: A downbeat earnings report, plus investor disdain for the pending Cox Communications merger, is sending the stock to a one-year low.

item.title: AEye’s LIDR Stock Soars on NVIDIA Partnership: What’s Driving the Surge and What’s the Catch?
item.description: Buckle up, folks, because AEye, Inc. (NASDAQ: LIDR) is tearing up the market today like a hot rod on a drag strip! As of this writing, LIDR is up a ja...

item.title: Author Geraldine Brooks learned some hard personal-finance lessons when her husband died unexpectedly
item.description: “Memorial Days” is a memoir of grief, but also a practical reminder of the impact of money on anyone’s life.

item.title: These stocks reporting next week usually top analyst estimates and gain afterward
item.description: CNBC Pro screened Bespoke Investment Group data for stocks reporting next week that have a track record of beating analysts' forecasts and gaining the...

item.title: Investor Dan Niles' favorite picks for the rest of earnings season
item.description: Dan Niles, the founder of Niles Investment Management, has his eye on Microsoft and Nvidia as his two top stock picks this earnings season.

item.title: Bank of America double upgrades this rural retailer, says it will benefit from tariffs
item.description: Following solid second-quarter earnings, Bank of America double upgraded shares of Tractor Supply Company.

item.title: How to trade Apple using options into earnings next week
item.description: Jeff Kilburg sets the tape for the iPhone maker's earnings next week.

item.title: The breakout in this utilities ETF has room to run, says Carter Worth
item.description: Utilities, as all will know, generally lag the market over time. But there may be an opportunity now, says the chart analyst.

item.title: AEye’s Apollo Lidar Ignites Stock Surge with NVIDIA Partnership Breakthrough
